v1.headline: 7+ YC Startups, 13+ Growth & Marketing Tools Built | Helping YC Founders Launch, Automate & Scale | AI Engineer @ SoftAims
v1.about:
7+ YC Startups. 13+ Custom AI Marketing Tools Built.
Having worked directly with YC startups, I know the challenges they face:
    •    Rapid scaling
    •    Tight deadlines
    •    Constant need for innovation
I’m here to help YC founders automate their workflows, optimize user acquisition, and scale their marketing operations


 Achievements
    •    Developed 13+ AI marketing tools for automation, growth hacking, and campaign optimization.
    •    Helped YC founders integrate AI into their marketing products, delivering MVPs in 6 weeks ready to scale.
    •    Automated repetitive workflows, saving startups 10+ hours weekly and boosting efficiency.
Tools and Technologies


To deliver scalable, high-impact solutions, I leverage a range of advanced tools and technologies:
    •    AI and Machine Learning
    •    LLMs: GPT-4, Claude, LLaMA for personalized campaign automation.
    •    Predictive analytics for user behavior modeling and churn reduction.
    •    Automation Platforms
    •    HubSpot, Marketo, ActiveCampaign for email and lead automation.
    •    Zapier, Make (formerly Integromat) for automating cross-platform workflows.
    •    Data and Analytics
    •    Real-time dashboards with Power BI, Looker, Google Analytics.
    •    Mixpanel, Segment for user tracking and cohort analysis.
    •    CRM Integration
    •    Custom API integrations with Salesforce, Pipedrive, and other CRMs for streamlined operations.
    •    RAG & Vector Search
    •    LangChain, ElasticSearch for content retrieval and AI-driven recommendations.
    •    Custom Development
    •    Python, Node.js, Django for backend automation.
    •    React, Vue.js for dynamic, user-friendly frontends.
    •    AI Agents
    •    Built AI agents to automate multi-channel campaigns, from social media ads to personalized email sequences.


If you’re a founder looking to build or integrate AI into your marketing tools, let’s connect.
